title: Roast spatchcock chicken with a burrata and slow roasted tomato salad
description: Heavenly roast chicken with a mustard and onion glaze, rich slow roasted tomatoes and with creamy burrata mozzarella
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
175g/6oz wood-roasted piquillo peppers, chopped (available from some supermarkets and delicatessens)
2 x 200g/7oz burrata mozzarella cheese, torn into pieces
